column2:
"So, was it fun?
I am completely satisfied.
It felt really, really good."

"You look like you misunderstand
this to mean this kind of thing isn't bad... hahaha, hahaha..."

"Oh my, my, my. I'm sorry.
I, of all people, ended up blurting
out something strange, eh?"

"It's a terrible mistake to think that
the greatest joy for us is shooting,
shooting, shooting, shooting hostiles."
"In any case, let's shoot, knock down, smash, wipe out, and kill a wide range of hostiles sometime in the future."
